properties.name: onriot.mail.admin.addresses
properties.description: Comma separated email addresses from site admins.

properties.name: onriot.db.migration.table
properties.description: Database table name where migrations are managed.

properties.name: onriot.db.init.sqls
properties.description: SQL's to execute right after database connection is stabilised.

properties.name: onriot.migration.init.sqls
properties.description: SQL's to execute right before migration manager.

properties.name: onriot.server.port
properties.description: Process id when executing the scraper.

properties.name: onriot.error.level
properties.description: Define error level for current execution.

properties.name: onriot.db.poolsize
properties.description: Size of pool connection for database.

properties.name: onriot.mail.sender.pass
properties.description: Mail sender password for SMTP access.

properties.name: onriot.thread.max.pool.size
properties.description: Limit pool size for thread count.
